display_long_description:
Ocean Quest VR is a hands-on, story-driven educational experience in which players become environmental heroes, one cleanup mission at a time.

In this early-access demo, you’ll join Captain Finn and enthusiastic guide Lila to clean up a trash-covered beach, sort waste into proper recycling bins, and earn Green Points. But your journey doesn’t stop at the shore.

Dive beneath the waves to rescue trapped marine life like Bubbles and Jamie, explore a coral reef devastated by pollution, and help clean up an underwater village overtaken by plastic waste. Along the way, you’ll use VR interactions to grab, sort, and recycle, while learning real-world facts about ocean pollution and sustainability.

Whether collecting bottles on the beach or cutting nets to free sea creatures, Ocean Quest VR is a vibrant introduction to environmental awareness, made for all ages.

Family-friendly
No ads, no in-app purchases
Educational and interactive
Early Access Demo. More missions coming soon!
